item.title: Short-Form Video Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled content creator to produce short-form video content ads for our business. The primary platforms for these ads will be Tiktok, Youtube Shorts, and Snapchat. As a content creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, scripting, shooting, and editing engaging videos that effectively promote our products and services. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of the target audience on each platform and the ability to tailor content accordingly. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to work independently are essential for success in this role.

Skills needed:
- Video production
- Storytelling
- Scriptwriting
- Video editing
- Familiarity with Tiktok, Youtube Shorts, and Snapchat

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.

Expertise level: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $5.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 06:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: VFX: Add Liquid and Remove Jar Lid - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

Please view the attached reference images and linked file. We would like to remove the lid of the jar from the shot so it appears open, and then as the woman pours it in over the man, we would like green liquid to pour into his mouth.

Thanks!

item.title: AI image and video creator - Upwork
item.description:
**Job Overview:**

We are seeking a talented and innovative AI Content Creator & Editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will be proficient in leveraging AI technology to create and edit high-quality content for various social media platforms. This role involves creating engaging, original content as directed, and ensuring it aligns with our brand voice and objectives.

**Responsibilities:**

- Utilize AI tools to generate creative and engaging content for social media.
- Edit and refine AI-generated content to meet quality standards and brand guidelines.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to understand content requirements and objectives.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in AI content creation and social media marketing.
- Ensure all content is accurate, well-written, and adheres to our company’s tone and style.
- Manage multiple projects and deliver high-quality work within deadlines.

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience as a content creator or editor, preferably with experience in AI-generated content.
- Proficiency in using AI tools and technologies for content creation (e.g., OpenAI GPT, Jasper, etc.).
- Strong understanding of social media platforms and their content requirements.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- Strong attention to detail and a creative mindset.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Previous experience working in a remote or freelance setting.
- Familiarity with graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Creative Suite) is a plus.

**Why Join Us:**

- Work with a dynamic and innovative team.
- Flexible working hours and remote work environment.
- Opportunity to work on exciting projects and grow your skills in AI content creation.

If you are passionate about creating cutting-edge content and have the skills to transform AI-generated material into compelling social media posts, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now and become a part of our creative team!

---

**How to Apply:**

Please submit your resume, a cover letter, and a portfolio of your previous work, including examples of AI-generated content you have created or edited.

SHortlisted Candidates will be presented with clear documentation about the role and have the opportunity to book a meeting with us to discuss

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 18, 2024 06:24 UTC
Category: Image Editing
Skills:AI Image Editing, Image Editing, AI Video Generation, AI Video Generator
Skills: AI Image Editing, Image Editing, AI Video Generation, AI Video Generator
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video recording project with iPhone Pro lidar sensor - Upwork
item.description:
We are urgently looking for 1500 video recorders who has any iPhone pro series mobile phone to record.

Here are some key points to keep in mind.

- Person should have only a Pro series of iPhone because the recording needs a Lidar sensor.
- No human body part should be visible in frame while recording video of the object such cases will get rejected  
- Light on the object should be good and no shadow should be there
- Camera should not be far from the object
- Reflective surfaces like glass dining tables should be avoided while recording the video of the object.
- No PII or NSFW data
- No duplicate objects
- Avoid soft or deformable objects
- The application is available in App store.

**The budget is $1.25 per object.**
**Payment will be done in every 15 days.**
**The project duration is 3 months for now and you can provide as many videos as you can.**
**You can earn $25 in a day by submitting 20 videos**

Looking forward to getting your positive response.

A very good opportunity to get 5-Star ratings and wonderful feedback.

Best regards,



Budget: $25
Posted On: June 18, 2024 06:20 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Videography, Lidar, Sensor, Translation, Video Capture Device
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Videography, Lidar, Sensor, Translation, Video Capture Device
Country: India
click to apply
